title: Understanding is not enough
creator_credit: Indignata Filmnic, Uniting Church in Australia, Keith Head and Alison Head
brief_description: This film is a documentary about the Uniting Church and the liaison work it is involved in with the Aboriginal people in Victoria. By interviewing Aborigines and others involved in the liaison work, the film examines what it means to be Aboriginal in Victoria.
creator_credit_for_label: Indignata Filmnic, Uniting Church in Australia, Keith Head and Alison Head
